---
title: "Weather Monitoring"
format: html
---

We use weather data from [NOAA Custom GHCN-Daily](https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/metadata/geoportal/rest/metadata/item/gov.noaa.ncdc:C00861/html#).
Raw data are automatically collected into a table from all active stations in the study region.

We use the PRISM dataset (http://www.prism.oregonstate.edu/documents/PRISM_datasets.pdf) to calculate anomalies at the site (% average precipitation and temperature).

- Location: Lat: 26.0832 Lon: -80.6252 Elev: 2m
- Spatial resolution: 4km
- PRISM day definition: 24 hours ending at 1200 UTC on the day shown
